DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility Cook Ureteral Stent reduce post-stent placement pain urinary symptom patient follow ureteroscopy urolithiasis .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo ureteroscopy urolithiasis temporary ureteral stenting indicate Patient unwilling unable sign date inform consent Patient unwilling comply followup study schedule Patient pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant course study Patient currently take anticholinergic antispasm medication Patient currently take sildenafil , tadalafil , vardenafil Patient know sensitivity alphablocker medication Patient currently undergo chemotherapy radiation therapy Patient active urinary tract infection Patient chronic renal failure , hemodialysis , chronic peritoneal dialysis Patient require bilateral shock wave lithotripsy , bilateral stent , bilateral symptomatic kidney stone Patient ureteral stent within past three month either ureter Patient unable accurately detect report bladder function pain Patient chronic pain
